author: Staff Reporter
text:
In a bid to propagate the importance of voting in the upcoming May 16 Assembly polls, badges carrying messages to ensure 100 percent polling, were given to officials of government departments at the Collectorate here on Thursday.

According to a statement, Collector and District Election Officer M. Ravikumar distributed the badges to the officials and asked them all to wear until May 16.

People could watch these officials wearing such badges while moving in public places and it would help encourage the voters to exercise their franchise.

The District Administration has been organising several programmes to create awareness about voting, he said.

Moreover, the Collector said a total of 8, 183 polling personnel including 235 micro observers would be deputed to man polling in 1,559 polling booths in six Assembly constituencies across Thoothukudi district.

Further, he said the officials in 129 zones in the district were being apprised of necessary methods to be adopted for the polling process.
title: Badges on cent per cent polling
